comprehensive_overview: Bowtie is a fast and memory-efficient short read aligner for short DNA sequences. It aligns short DNA sequences (reads) to the human genome at a rate of over 25 million reads per hour on a typical workstation with a large amount of memory.
core_features: Some core features of Bowtie include ultrafast alignment, memory efficiency, support for gapped alignment, support for multi-core processing, and compatibility with various sequencing platforms.
